name: Future Shock (funcybear)
description:
Future Shock.
You have to battle your way to VICTORY!!!
Every round is 5-10m long fight till your victory!

Socials:

➡️Do not click in this link: https://bit.ly/3FiKaIN

What Does this game include?

3 Music Soundtracks

2 Levels (more are coming!)

Free Multiplayer (Host and play)

Controls: 

W forward

S backwards

A Left

D Right

Space to jump

Mouse to look around

and Left Shift to sprint
